About Me

Hey there, I am Lavina Dhingana

BIO

I am a motivated and disciplined individual who is continually looking for ways to improve herself and inspire people around her. I attempt to put myself through obstacles that force me to venture outside of my comfort zone, forcing me to strive to be someone who is knowledgeable in all areas rather than just one.
